app.name: WiiFlow Lite Einstein Mod
app.long_description:
WiiFlow Lite is a app for loading backup games from a USB Device or SD card. It displays your games in a coverflow with 3D full box covers.
This is a modded version created by einsteinx2.
Key features of WiiFlow Lite: * Emulated NAND support * Plugin system for emu apps * Devolution support * Nintendont support * Neek2o support
Key features of the Einstein Mod: * Settings to disable GC game selection sound * Improved app launch time * Fixed 20 second pause when no USB drive is plugged in if you only use an SD card * Launch animation now starts immediately rather than sitting at a black screen * Some UI and UX improvements
